hotels.title: Sophisticated Stay in South Korea's 'Smart City' with Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Welcome to South Korea’s ‘smart city’ - designed for communities to work, eat and play in close quarters and home to the stylish Holiday Inn Incheon Songdo, an IHG hotel. Teetering on the edge of Songdo’s Central Park, this modern stay boasts glittering views and a central address close to major shopping strips with world-class Korean beauty and fashion stores. Admire warm wood-trimmed Korean design at Touch Sky Rooftop Bar and indulge in a sophisticated cocktail under dim lighting, or plan for dinner at Surache Dining with the romantic twinkle of the Songdo skyline as your backdrop.
